Name: `inspect.data()`
Description: Check data frame for structural errors that affect further analysis.

Name: `calc.bg.rate()`
Description: Calculate background RO~2~ from one or more data columns.

Name: `calc.rate()`
Description: Calculate background RO~2~ from one or more data columns.

Name: `auto.rate()`
Description: Calculate BMR, MMR, "interval" rate, or "best-fit" rate.

Name: `convert.rate()`
Description: Convert between units of RO2 (not MO2).

Name: `scale.rate()`
Description: Convert R~O2~ values to volume- and/or mass-specific MO~2~.

Name: `pcrit()`
Description: Calculate critical oxygen tension as described in Yeager & Ultsch (1989).

Name: `subsample()`
Description: Reduce the size of a large data frame by extracting every n-th row.
